DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Ulthera® System obtain lift tighten cheek tissue , reduction jowling , improve jawline definition and/or submental skin laxity increase density treatment apply .
DOC.brief_title: Lifting Tightening Face Neck Following Increased Density Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: All enrol study subject receive one full face neck Ultherapy™ treatment . Pre- post-treatment photo take . Subjects required return follow-up visit 60 day , 90 day , 180 day 1 year follow treatment .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 30 65 year Subject good health Desires lift tighten cheek tissue , reduction jowling , improvement jawline definition and/or submental skin laxity Understands accept obligation undergo procedure area treat followup period Willingness ability comply protocol requirement , include return followup visit abstain exclusionary procedure duration study Presence active systemic local skin disease may affect wound heal Severe solar elastosis Excessive subcutaneous fat cheek Excessive skin laxity lower face neck Significant scar area treat Significant open facial wound lesion Severe cystic acne face Presence metal stent implant facial area treat , pacemaker , cochlear implant
